pages.text: $(li)The Bellringer is a spectre that uses its Bell to guide lost souls to the Nether.$(br)$(li)It can only be summoned using the $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_bellringer)Haunted Bell$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will attack you with spectral blocks, either throwing them at you, or forming lines that you must dodge if you don't want to take a lot of damage.

pages.name: Bellringer
pages.text: The Bellringer drops $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingots$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/meet_your_fight/phantoplasm)Phantoplasm$(/l) upon death.
